faq.title: FAQ
faq.a1: MagicTime is an innovative crypto project where time becomes a digital asset. Each MAGT token is a “fragment of time” you can own, exchange and use in the ecosystem.
faq.q2: Which currency do I pay with?
faq.a2: USDT (Jetton) on the TON network. Connect via TonConnect in your wallet.
faq.a3: After the presale ends, the Claim button will appear. You’ll be able to receive tokens to your TON address.
faq.a4:
The invitee buys MAGT using your link ?ref=YOUR_ADDRESS. After a successful purchase, 5% is credited to your address in MAGT.

  • Binding happens on first visit via the link.
  • Self-referral is forbidden.
  • A minimum purchase may apply (anti-spam).
faq.q5: How does the price change during presale?
faq.a5: The presale runs in rounds. Each next round has a higher token price. The buy page shows current price, remaining amount and funds raised.
faq.a6: Yes, a minimum may be set to reduce network costs and spam. See the buy form for the current value.
faq.a7: Any TON wallets with TonConnect support (e.g., Tonkeeper, MyTonWallet).
faq.a8: You pay TON network fees for the USDT (Jetton) transfer. The amount depends on network load and is shown in the wallet.
faq.q9: Is it safe? What are the risks?
faq.a9: Crypto investments are risky. Don’t invest more than you can lose. Verify the domain, contract and TonConnect wallet connection. Team may use KYC/audits where appropriate.
faq.a10: Email us at hello@mag.example or via Telegram support.
